physical_appearance: "The image shows a digital print, an artist's proof, and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist's proof are black and red in colour. The background of the digital print and artist's proof show the metal structure of a building, which is red in colour. At the left hand side of the digital print and artist's proof, a construction worker can be seen sitting atop a metal beam. He is wearing a blue helmet and is using a hammer on the bolts in the steel structure.  The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame, ""Iron and Steel"" is stated at the top for the image at the bottom. ""Tan Lip Seng
creator_1: Tan, Lip Seng, 1942- Tan, Lip Seng
